name: The Moth Oracle's Poem
description:
Made for the Bitsy Moth Jam with my partner, Peter <3

Come meditate on the Moth Oracle's poem when you need it. Please do actually say it aloud <3

Design, Art & other writing: @mutantcassidy

Design & Poem: Peter Wallis

Thank you for meditating with us.

Special thanks to @adamledoux for creating Bitsy and this jam!
